```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Import data
```{r}
spp_data <- read.csv(here("data", "input", "living_species_present_1.csv"))

plot_data <- read.csv(here("data", "input", "Form_1_0.csv"))
```

Match ID to plot number
```{r}
colnames(spp_data)[1]
spp_data <- left_join(x = spp_data, y = plot_data, by = join_by(ParentGlobalID, GlobalID))
```
